title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8C.11 - Use of Traffic Control Signals for Control of LRT Vehicles at Grade Crossings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8C.11 - Use of Traffic Control Signals for Control of LRT Vehicles at Grade Crossings

State Regulations
INSERT the following at the beginning of the
section: Standard: 00A The provisions in Part 4, Section
8C.09, and the New York State

Supplement relating to traffic control signal design, installation and
operation, including interconnection with nearby automatic gates or
flashing-light signals, shall be applicable as appropriate where traffic
control signals are used at highway-LRT grade crossings. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8C.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
